javadoc:
{@link GFileSystem} add-on interface to allow filesystems to override how image files
 are converted into viewable {@link Icon} instances.

methods.name: getIcon
methods.comment:
A method that GFileSystem can implement if they need to preprocess
 image files so that Ghidra can display them.

params.name: file
params.comment: GFile to read and convert into an Icon.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: TaskMonitor to watch and update with progress.

throws.comment: if problem reading or converting image.

return.comment: new Icon instance with contents of the GFile.

methods.name: getIconForFile
methods.comment: Helper static method that will get an Icon from a data file.

params.name: file
params.comment: GFile to read and convert into an Icon.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: TaskMonitor to watch and update with progress.

return.comment:
new Icon instance with contents of the GFile, or null if the
 file couldn't be converted into an image.

name: GIconProvider
comment:
GFileSystem add-on interface to allow filesystems to override how image files
 are converted into viewable Icon instances.
